abstract.t: This document is intended to be a source of information about updated version of the block cipher with block length of n=64 bits and key length k=256 bits (RFC5830), which is also referred as "Magma" and is described in the Russian Federal standard GOST R 34.12-2015, containing also the description of block cipher "Kuznechik" (RFC7801). These algorithms are from the set of Russian cryptographic standard algorithms (called GOST algorithms).
